articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Slip as Tariff Deadline Sours Mood: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: A global stock selloff extended to a sixth day - the longest losing streak since September 2023 - as President Donald Trump boosted tariffs across the world and two days of solid megacap tech earnings failed to lift sentiment.
articles.content: A global stock selloff extended to a sixth day - the longest losing streak since September 2023 - as President Donald Trump boosted tariffs across the world and two days of solid megacap tech earning… [+388 chars]
